Profiles¶

profiles.views.friend_profile_view(request, userId)[source]¶

This method returns the view of friend profile It is open for any profile

Parameters

  • name – request - it generates the response(HTTP)

  • type – HttpResponse

  • name – userId - It contains the userId of requested user

  • type – Int

Returns

returns the profile view

Returns

returns the profile view

profiles.views.my_profile_view(request)[source]¶

This method creates the view of my-profile and post request of update my profile. It will update the profile form and show the profile data. This method only work for logged in user.

Parameters

  • name – request - it generates the response(HTTP)

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns the profile view

profiles.views.save_talen_poll(request, skill, userId)[source]¶

This method creates the view of talent poll. This method only work for logged in user.

Parameters

  • name – request - it generates the response(HTTP)

  • type – HttpResponse

  • name – skill - It contains the saved skill

  • type – String

  • name – userId - It contains the userId of requested user

  • type – Int

Returns

returns the profile view

profiles.views.talent_poll(request)[source]¶

This method creates the view of talent poll. This method only work for logged in user.

Parameters

  • name – request - it generates the response(HTTP)

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns the talent poll view
